author: Special Correspondent
text:
Set fire to their bike for creating ruckus in the middle of the road

An irate mob thrashed two youths, who were inebriated, and set their bike on fire after they created a ruckus in front of Vijaya Nagar Club on Tuesday night. The youths are Rajesh and Prajwal, both in their 20s. The police said that they had consumed alcohol in a bar at Vijaya Nagar.

Later, they parked their bike in the middle of the road and obstructed other people.
title: Mob thrashes drunk youths
